targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM snapshots WHERE period_type = 'MONTH' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM snapshots WHERE period_type = 'MONTH' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshots WHERE period_type = 'MONTH' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT 'Monthly Income' AS metric, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS start_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS end_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS delta FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Forward 12m Income', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.forward_12m_total') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.forward_12m_total') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Current Yield %', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Yield on Cost %', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) FROM latest;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshots WHERE period_type = 'MONTH' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT 'Monthly Income' AS metric, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS start_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS end_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS delta FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Forward 12m Income', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.forward_12m_total') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.forward_12m_total') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Current Yield %', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'Yield on Cost %', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.start.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.end.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.income.delta.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) FROM latest;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshots WHERE period_type = 'MONTH' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT '10Y Yield' AS metric, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.start.ten_year_yield') AS REAL) AS start_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.end.ten_year_yield') AS REAL) AS end_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.avg.ten_year_yield') AS REAL) AS avg_val, CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.delta.ten_year_yield') AS REAL) AS delta FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT '2Y Yield', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.start.two_year_yield') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.end.two_year_yield') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.avg.two_year_yield') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.delta.two_year_yield') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'VIX', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.start.vix') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.end.vix') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.avg.vix') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.delta.vix') AS REAL) FROM latest UNION ALL SELECT 'CPI YoY', CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.start.cpi_yoy') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.end.cpi_yoy') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.avg.cpi_yoy') AS REAL), CAST(json_extract(payload_json, '$.period_summary.macro.delta.cpi_yoy') AS REAL) FROM latest;
